de.polygonal.ds.ArrayedDeque

type
class
A deque ("double-ended queue", pronounced "deck") is a linear list for which all insertions and deletions (and usually all accesses) are made at the ends of the list.

Constructor

new(size : Int)

Instance Methods

back() : T

clear() : Void

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Queue is empty or dispose() wasn't direcly called after dequeue()(if debug flag is set).
Overwrites the last dequeued element with null so it can be garbage collected. Use only directly after dequeue().

popBack() : T

popFront() : T

pushBack(x : T) : Void
